keel.Algorithms.Decision_Trees.C45_Binarization

Class OVO

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Decision_Trees.C45_Binarization.OVO

  • public class OVO
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: OVO

    Description: This class implements the Binarization methodology (OVO and OVO )

    Company: KEEL

    Since:
    JDK1.6
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Mikel Galar (University of Navarra) 21/10/2010, Alberto Fernandez (University of Jaen) 15/05/2014

           java.lang.String sOvo,

        Parameters:
        classifier - the multi-classifier containing the base classifiers
        sOvo - the aggregation to be used
        dynOVO - whether the final aggregation is the dynamic OVO

      • relationsForInstance

        public double[][][] relationsForInstance(double[][] tabla)
        Retrieves the preference, conflict and ignorance matrices for a single instance
        Parameters:
        tabla - The instance for which the PCI-matrices shall be created
        Returns:
        [0][][] preference matrix, [1][][] conflict matrix, [2][][] ignorance matrix
